2544353492.name: Has Been Read
2544353492.description:
[h1][b]A similar feature has been added to vanilla in Build 42, showing checkmarks on books you've already read or no longer need. However, this mod is based on a different concept: "Rather than showing what you've already read, this mod shows what you *should* read next."

With this mod, unread or unfinished books are clearly marked, making it far easier to spot what to grab during looting - especially in urgent situations where every second counts.

Even in Build 42, this mod continues to offer faster recognition and survival-focused UI assistance. Use whichever system fits your playstyle - or both in combination![/b][/h1]

[h1]Overview :[/h1]
Add the unread mark on the book's icon that has not been read or has been read only halfway.
[b][i]Confirmed to work with Build 41/42 and also work on MP.[/i][/b]

[h1]Features :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Books that have not been read will display the original icon with "?". This includes skill books that are no longer needed at current level.
[*]Books that have been read only halfway will display the original icon with "!".
[*]Books that have been read completly will display the original icon only.
[*]You can mark a book. For example, you can check to see if you got it or not. Marking can be done from the context menu of the target item.
[/list]

[h1]Options :[/h1]
These options are available with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]Mod Options[/url] in B41.
[list]
[*]Target Items : Can choose which item types to show marks on.
[list]
[*]Skill Book
[*]Recipe Magazine
[*]Flier
[*]Brochure
[*]Titled Literature
[*]CD
[*]VHS
[*]Home VHS
[/list]
[*]Show Marks : Can choose which item types to show marks on.
[list]
[*]"Not Read" mark (?)
[*]"Not Completed" mark (!)
[*]"Already Read" mark (v)
[/list]
[*]Show "Current Target" mark (o) : Can specify whether to show or hide.
[*]Show "Self Marking" mark (/) : Can specify whether to show or hide.
[list]
[*]Display a mark (pencil) on marked items
[*]Display a mark (eraser) on unmarked items
[/list]
[*]Auto Marking : Automatically mark when retrieved to your inventory (including holding containers).
[/list]
[i]These options have been deprecated in v3.0.
[list]
[*]Show "Not Completed" mark as "Not Read" mark (! -> ?) : Can specify whether to change the display or not.
[*]Reverse Marking Display : Reverses the display of Self Marking (defaults to all books with Self Marking displayed).
[*]Share Flier Mark : Can specify whether to share the flier marks.
[*]Share Brochure Mark : Can specify whether to share the brochure marks.
[*]Share Titled Literature Mark : Can specify whether to share the titled literature marks.
[*]Share Self Marking : Can specify whether to  share the self marking.
[/list][/i]

[h1]Known Issues :[/h1]
[list]
[*]For CD/VHS/HomeVHS, only the "Not Read" mark will be displayed, the "Not Completed" mark will not be displayed at this time and will be treated as unread.
[/list]

[h1]Future plans :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Bug fix (if exists)
[/list]

[h1]Remarks :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Modded books should also work as long as they comply with the vanilla's book-implementation.
[*]To make the Map/Flier/Brochure/TitledLiterature already read, these items must be read after enabling this Mod. These items read before enabling this Mod will be displayed as not read. And, the read status of these items will not be transferred to other characters. While map information is retained, the read status for the map will be reset. To clear the unread mark on the map, you must read the map again.
[*]You may add it to your mod pack without confirmation and credit. However, please use at your own risk, as I have not been able to verify that it works with MP.
[*]Since v1.1, the implementation is very dependent on vanilla code. Therefore, I hope that the function of this Mod will be implemented on the vanilla side in the future.
[*][h3][b]If you were unable to log in to the MP server due to an upgrade of this mod, please try the previous versions by downloading them from "Change Notes".[/b][/h3]
[/list]

[h1]Release Notes :[/h1]
[list]
[*]v3.0 - Supported Build 42.13 MP, reorganized the options.
[*]v2.15 - Hotfix for Build 42.13.
[*]v2.14 - Supported Titled Literature, improved compatibility with Inventory Tetris (B42).
[*]v2.13 - Supported Flier/Brochure, added share options.
[*]v2.12 - Supported options for Build 42.
Please refer to "Change Notes" for the older history.
[/list]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199151439614/myworkshopfiles/][img]https://imgur.com/VE2Dqpw.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2890440427][img]https://imgur.com/7nnRZhd.png[/img][/url]
[b]My most favorite mod, "Pump Pury" has been flagged as sensitive content and is no longer visible to many users. Please help rescue this mod![/b]

[code]
If you enjoy this mod and would like to support its development, you can do so through the services below. Your support helps cover the cost of renting a dedicated server for multiplayer testing, as well as AI service subscriptions used for development ? expenses I personally pay for every month, totaling over $50. Thanks to your support, I can continue improving, maintaining, and expanding this mod for everyone.

[url=https://ko-fi.com/pepepepepeil][img]https://imgur.com/y5Ih4mO.png[/img][/url]
[/code]

Workshop ID: 2544353492
Mod ID: P4HasBeenRead

2927603127.name: Metal Spears
2927603127.description:
This mod adds a set of metal spears to the game.

These spears are stronger, and more durable than their wooden counterparts, however they are also heavier, and require more resources to craft.
They can spawn rarely in the world. They can be crafted, but not repaired or dissembled.

For B42:  A few more spears have been added given new items available, however I have kept it to the original design in that stronger items must be used. Recipe had to change as the recipe system has been overhauled. Also note that once crafted they can not be dissembled like wooden spears. Keep them patched up!

There is no specific crafting recipe, they will unlock on reaching a certain skill level in spears, or maintainence, or on learning the meta-recipe: Bind Spear.

B42MP: Fixed to work for SP, haven't checked if it is working on MP. Please let me know.

[url=ko-fi.com/wyr3d] [img]https://i.ibb.co/pyYz3q0/kofii.png[/img][/url]

Workshop ID: 2927603127
Mod ID: MetalSpears
Mod ID: MetalSpears

3238830225.name: B42.13 / B41 Real Firearms【v1.1.31】WIP
3238830225.description:
[b] Language：CN 、EN
Other languages：please translate and publish the mod by yourself [/b]



[h1] IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED TO USE THIS MOD TOGETHER WITH OTHER FIREARM MOD. IN CASE OF ANY CONFLICTS，THIS MOD SHALL NOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE [/h1]


[h1] My game video channel bilibili search：喵老大_MiaoLD [/h1]
[h1] Programming：SportXAI / bilibili search：SportXAI [/h1]





[h1][b] Introduction [/b][/h1]
[b] Real firearms proportion model
Real firearms rate of fire
Real firearms sound sampling	[u]（ each firearm has its own sound effect ）[/u]
Real firearms material texture
Real firearms weight [/b]

[h3] Direction of module production [/h3]
[b] As much as possible，keep the firearm data balanced and not overly powerful

The experience of different guns varies in details, with their values set based on the real world specifications of each firearm

Create differentiation among firearms，enabling players to use different types of guns to deal with zombies in various situations [/b]



[h1][b] Firearm Spawn Mechanic（ Fixed gameplay ） [/b][/h1]
[h3] Military Spawn - 30 Guns [/h3]
[b] Spawn Locations：Military Bases、Checkpoints、Army Surplus Stores、Zombie Drops...etc all locations related to the military

Spawns：Firearms、Magazines、Accessories、Ammo Boxes、Ammo Cartons

Zombies: ArmyCamoGreen、ArmyCamoDesert
NOTE：These zombies only drop firearms & magazines

【.30-06】BAR
【.45】M3A1
【5.56x45】Honey Badger，HK 416A5，M249，M4A1，Colt M723，Colt M727
【7.62x25】Type 64
【7.62x39】AK-15，AK-47，RPD，81-1
【7.62x51】DVL-10，FAL，M110，M24，M60，MK17，MK20，MCX Spear
【7.62x54】PKM，SVD
【7.92x33】StG 44
【7.92x57】MG 42，FG 42
【9x18】APS
【9x19】P226
【12G】Saiga-12K，USAS-12 [/b]


[h3] Police Spawn - 16 Guns [/h3]
[b] Spawn Locations：Police Stations、Security Posts、Prisons、Zombie Drops...etc Police related areas

Spawns：Firearms、Magazines、Accessories、Ammo Boxes、Ammo Cartons

Zombies: Police、Detective、PrisonGuard
NOTE：These zombies only drop firearms & magazines

【.38】S&W M60
【.45】UMP 45，USP 45，Vecto
【.357】Colt Python
【5.56x45】AR 15，SG 552，G36K
【9x18】PB，PP Bizon
【9x19】MP5 SD，UMP 9，Glock 18，RO635
【12G】SPAS-12，Mossberg 590 [/b]


[h3] Civilian Spawn - 21 Guns [/h3]
[b] Spawn Locations：Residential Areas、Bar Counters、Hunting Cabins、Survivor Shelters、Looted Cabins、Drug Dealer Labs, Drug Dealer Hideouts、Gun Stores、Zombie Drops...etc There are many other locations that I won't list one by one

NOTE：Civilian-Gun Store has a relatively high spawn rate，while Civilian-Zombie has the lowest

Civilian-Gun Store Spawns：Firearms、Magazines、Accessories、Ammo Boxes、Ammo Cartons

Civilian-Regular ( Residential Areas...etc ) Spawns：Firearms、Magazines、Ammo Boxes

Zombies: Hunter、PrivateMilitia、Biker、Inmate
NOTE：These zombies only drop firearms & magazines

【.30-06】M1903，M1 Garand
【.45】MAC-10，De Lisle
【.357】COP .357
【.500】S&W M500
【5.56x45】ADAR 2-15
【7.62x25】TT-33，PPSh-41
【7.62x39】SKS
【7.62x54】Mosin-Nagant，AVT-40
【7.92x33】VG 1-5
【7.92x57】Kar 98K，G43
【9x18】PM
【9x19】Browning High-Power，MP 40，Luger P08
【12G】DP-12，Single Barrel Shotgun（ Pistol ） [/b]



[h1][b] Interesting features（ Tentative ） [/b][/h1]
[h3] Firearms with dedicated programming [/h3]
[b] B41 / B42：M1 Garand consistent with reality
NOTE：the cartridge clip of the B41 version will not drop，there is only sound effect
-
B41 / B42：SPAS-12 consistent with reality
B42：DP-12 consistent with reality [/b]



[h1][b] Firearm maintenance [/b][/h1]
[h3] Using WD40 metal lubricant [/h3]
[b] Skills required for repairing firearms：[u] Aiming，Mechanics，Metal Welding [/u]

NOTE #1：using all three skills simultaneously when repairing firearms will yield better repair results

NOTE #2：repair effectiveness is tied to skill levels—the higher the level，the better the repair results

NOTE #3：you can also repair firearms by training only one or two of these skills. It's just that using all three skills will produce better results

NOTE #4：with [u] WD40 metal lubricant [/u] available，right-click on the firearm and select repair [/b]



[h1][b] Major update plan（ Tentative ）[/b][/h1]
[b]  [h3]v1.3 - Waiting for updates [/h3]
【Real Firearm Actions】
Lever，Bullpup，Special
Remake of Vanilla Firearm Actions
——————————————————
【.44】Marlin M1894（ Rifle ）
【12G】Winchester M1887（ Shotgun ）

【9x39】Groza

Firearm Modification：

【SVD】SVU

Tentative [/b]

[b]  [h3]v1.2.XX - Waiting for updates [/h3]

【5.7x28】FN 57，AR 57

[b][h3] v1.2 - Waiting for updates [/h3]

sighting telescope，muzzle，bayonet，large capacity magazine，others
Firearms equipped with bayonets can be converted into melee weapons for use
——————————————————
Vanilla weapon remake：firearms，part，ammunition
Data & sound adjustment，magazine display，model modification or replacement

Remake all icons

Tentative [/b]

[b][h3] v1.1 - Updated already - May 12，2024 - August 2，2024 [/h3]

3437629766.name: [B42]CleanUI V2.3
3437629766.description:
B42.12 please  go here https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3627753624

[h2]Huge Thanks for Tchernobill, his fix patch help me quickly update this mod to work with B42.13.1[/h2]

[h3]V2.3 Update[/h3]
[list][*]The code has been updated to match B42.13.1,but didn't test on MP
[*]New way to hide equipment
[*]Items equipped in the hotbar have been merged into the Equipped Items.
[*]make the favourite icon smaller
[*]Will update to V2.4 in a few weeks,will bring a better way to transfer Items
[/list]

[hr]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/TFFM7ZZ.png[/img]
[h2]Completely Streamlined UI Layout[/h2]
[list][*]Move the container buttons to the left for more natural operation and to avoid taking up extra space when collapsed.
[*]All functions are moved to a collapsible panel
[*]"Transfer All" and "Take All" actions are integrated into the capacity display box
[*]Swapped item icons with collapse icons for cleaner organization
[*]Redesigned all UI textures with minimalist borders and high transparency
[*]Added auto-truncation for item/type names to prevent overlapping
[*]Adjusted text colors for better readability[/list]

[hr]
[h2]Clean Usage Guide[/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3qBGq7M.png[/img]

(1)"Transfer Button": Expands a menu to select transferring items by category/name. Can choose to transfer to a single container or nearby containers in ModOption
(2)"Transfer All/Take All": Transfer all or take all items. By default shows inventory capacity
(3)"Lock Button": Locks the panel. When locked, the panel cannot be dragged or scaled
(4)"Search": Searches items in current container. Matching items will be moved to top and highlighted
(5)"Divider Drag Button": Drag to control the width distribution between name and category columns
(6)"Sort Button": Expands a menu to sort items by name/weight/type
(7)"Collapse/Expand Items": Expand or collapse all items in current inventory
(8)"Hide Equipped Items": Can hide all equipped items. Items like generators in hand will be retained

[img]https://i.imgur.com/0goWZXm.png[/img]
(1) Set the transfer method for the "Transfer by Setting" button.
(2) Set the position of the sidebar in the personal inventory panel (left or right).
(3) Set the position of the sidebar in the loot panel (left or right).
(4) Adjust the background transparency of the panel's content area.
(5) Adjust the background transparency of the sidebar.
(6) Set the text color for item names.
(7) Set the text color for item types.

[hr]
[h2]Built-in Container Reordering[/h2]
Integrated ReorderContainers functionality - simply drag container icons to rearrange backpack slots

[h2]About Controller Support[/h2]
Since I don’t own a controller, I couldn’t test controller compatibility. Only the original game’s controller support remains, which may have limitations.

[h2]Mods you may need to unsubscribe from[/h2]
1.Reorder Containers (This feature is already integrated)
2.Search Container (This feature is already integrated)
3.Smart Stack (A similar feature is already available)
4.Auto Drop n' Loot (A similar feature is already available)
5.Bigger Inventory Container Icon (This may cause UI display issues, the icon has already been optimized)
6.Other mods related to UI inventory optimization may conflict (Only mods focused on UI optimization; most functional mods should not conflict)

If you enjoy my mod and your circumstances allow, it would be amazing if you could buy me a cup of coffee, but first and foremost, enjoy your game!
[url=https://afdian.com/a/23754956rocco][img]https://i.imgur.com/WLIHcQs.jpeg[/img][/url]

You can join my discord channel for more information [url=https://discord.gg/QCznu6naGw]Rocco's Mod[/url]

[quote]About permission  
You are free to extract and use any content from my mod without asking for permission.  
If you want to republish my mod, you need to follow these rules:  
1. There must be substantial and important improvements.  
2. If my mod has not been updated for a long time and has caused many issues, you may modify and republish it.[/quote]

Workshop ID: 3437629766
Mod ID: CleanUI

3451167732.name: [B42]ModernStatus V2.0
3451167732.description:
[h2]Already Updated to match B42.13[/h2]

[hr]

Note: This mod provides two different styles of character status indicators. You can freely switch between circular and bar styles, and it offers extensive customization options.

[h2]Two Switchable Styles[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/G0PiBCB.png[/img]  
Two switchable styles are provided. You can mix and match them to create the style you like.

[h2]Double-Click Quick Actions[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/dJm1Wax.png[/img]  
Simply double-click an indicator to quickly perform the corresponding action.  
[list]
[*] Thirst: Drink any safe liquid, drinking the appropriate amount based on thirst level (won’t drink alcohol)  
[*] Hunger, Calories, Protein, Fat, Carbohydrates: Eat any safe food; the amount consumed depends on hunger  
[*] Endurance: Sit down  
[*] Fatigue: Check in order — 1. Vitamins  2. Tea/Coffee (liquid)  3. Coffee/Tea bags  
[*] Unhappiness: Take antidepressants  
[*] Panic: Check in order — 1. Beta blockers  2. Drink 1/4 bottle of alcohol  
[*] Health: If injured and you have bandages, apply them  
[*] Sickness: Take antibiotics  
[*] Pain: Check in order — 1. Painkillers  2. Drink 1/4 bottle of alcohol  
[/list]

[h2]Extensive Customization Options[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vM2qjys.png[/img]  
Right-click an indicator to open the settings panel. Many customization options are available.  
There is also a global settings button — right-click it to apply certain settings to all indicators.

[h2]Alert Function[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/VqBssSX.gif[/img]  
When a status drops below a certain threshold (default is 20), an alert animation will appear.  
You can customize this value in the settings or set it to 0 to disable alerts.

[h2]Covers Almost All Player Stats[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/cSX0t4J.png[/img]  
Supported player statuses:  
[list]
[*] Thirst  
[*] Hunger  
[*] Endurance  
[*] Fatigue  
[*] Stress  
[*] Panic  
[*] Temperature  
[*] Health  
[*] Boredom  
[*] Unhappiness  
[*] Queasy  
[*] Sick  
[*] Pain  
[*] Calories  
[*] Carry Weight  
[*] Weight  
[*] Protein  
[*] Carbohydrates  
[*] Fat  
[*] Anger  
[*] Dirtiness  
[*] Wetness  
[*] Drunkenness  
[*] Medication duration (Antibiotics, Painkillers, Sleeping pills, Beta blockers — combined into one indicator, switching every ~2 seconds)  
[*] Supported Wash or Rot mod — Itchiness (combines bloodiness & dirtiness, displaying the higher value)  
[*] Supported LifeStyle:Hobby mod — Bathing need, Hygiene need  
[*] Supported Bodily Functions mod — Urination need, Defecation need  
[/list]

If you need support for additional statuses, feel free to leave a comment.

[h2]Fixing Common Issues[/h2]  
If your status indicators do not appear or are positioned outside the screen, you can fix it with the following steps:  
Find your Project Zomboid save folder, usually located here:  
[code][b]C:\Users\“[your user's name]”\Zomboid\Lua[/b][/code]  
Delete the file **ModernStatusConfig.lua**

[h2]Supported Languages[/h2]  
[list]
[*] EN  
[*] CN  
[*] ES (Thanks to Choko)  
[*] FR (Thanks to Bobitec)  
[*] PTBR (Thanks to NopOYes)  
[*] IT (Thanks to umbofor)  
[*] TR (Thanks to ♡ xeśs )  
[*] DE (Thanks to Tyraelmx)  
[*] KO (Thanks to Hx )  
[/list]
[hr]

If you enjoy my mod and your circumstances allow, it would be amazing if you could buy me a cup of coffee, but first and foremost, enjoy your game!
[url=https://afdian.com/a/23754956rocco][img]https://i.imgur.com/WLIHcQs.jpeg[/img][/url]
You can join my discord channel for more information [url=https://discord.gg/QCznu6naGw]Rocco's Mod[/url]

[quote]About permission  
You are free to extract and use any content from my mod without asking for permission.  
If you want to republish my mod, you need to follow these rules:  
1. There must be substantial and important improvements.  
2. If my mod has not been updated for a long time and has caused many issues, you may modify and republish it.[/quote]

Workshop ID: 3451167732
Mod ID: ModernStatus

3461263912.name: [B42]Clean HotBar v1.8
3461263912.description:
[h2]This Mod already updated to match B42.13[/h2]

[h2]V1.8 Update[/h2]
+ Fixed a bug where hiding empty slots caused incorrect mouse position detection
+ Removed some unnecessary animation effects
+ Updated several textures
+ Optimized the code structure, and cleaned up redundant functions.

[h2]V1.7 Update[/h2]  
+ Added a feature to show/hide empty slots.  
+ Improved the display of the settings button — it now only appears when the mouse hovers over the hotbar.  

[hr]
When playing Project Zomboid, this Hotbar UI has always annoyed me. Unlike most games' UI designs, it fails to intuitively display weapon status and blocks part of the screen visibility. That's why I've been redesigning this UI for a long time. After studying equipment UIs from various games, I've found a more optimal solution.

[h2]B42-Compatible Status Display[/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vSq7e8H.png[/img]
This mod visually integrates all new weapon/item statuses added in B42:
[list]
[*][b]Weapon Head Condition:[/b] Displays a status bar above the slot if weapon has head condition data
[*][b]Weapon Sharpness:[/b] Similar to head condition but with two values:
[list]
[*]White: Actual sharpness
[*]Brown: Maximum sharpness (see [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3461263912/600775381612528270]here[/url])
[*][b]Toggleable Items:[/b] Clear ON/OFF indicators for items like flashlights
[*][b]Ammo Counter:[/b] Displays ammunition count above firearm slots
[/list]

[h2]Hand-Equipped Display Improvements[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qdn3lSz.png[/img]  
Now it's not just the hotbar,hand-equipped can also display more detailed information.  
Additionally, the original game’s textures have been optimized with added transparency.

[h2]B42 Liquid System Integration[/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Hx8z1gT.png[/img]
The new B42 liquid system is visualized with color-coded bars. While I used AI-generated color values (which may have inaccuracies), you can easily identify liquid types. Please provide feedback for any inconsistencies.

[h2]Animation Effects[/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/KMJ1EZb.gif[/img]
Designed to minimize distraction while providing durability alerts:
[list]
[*][b]Durability Shake:[/b] Items shake during durability loss (e.g. flashlight battery drain)
[*][b]Flashing Effect:[/b] Durability values flash when decreasing
[*][b]Liquid Drain:[/b] Smooth animation mimicking drinking actions
[*]A warning appears above the character's head when the durability of the equipped weapon decreases (can be disabled in the settings panel).
[/list]

[h2]Customizable Settings[/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tr3AbW6.png[/img]
[list]
[*]Disable all status displays for hardcore players
[*]Adjust status bar heights to your preference
[*]Enable [b]tooltips[/b] (default: off) to show item details on hover
[*]Scale the size of hotbar
[*]Toggle weapon durability warning animation above character.
[/list]

[h2]Compatibility[/h2]
[list]
[*]Compatible with "Reorder the Hotbar" — I’ve also designed a better integration method for it: the button that originally appeared on the hotbar is now moved to the settings panel (for best results, place Clean Hotbar at the bottom of the load order, loading other mods first).
[*]There may be conflicts with any mods that display status indicators on the hotbar.
[*]If you encounter any errors or the mod doesn't work as expected, try placing Clean Hotbar at the bottom of the mod load order so other mods load first.[/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pEPGwZV.png[/img]

[h2]Handheld Equipment Slot[/h2]
Currently only basic status displays implemented. Open to creative suggestions!

[hr]
If you enjoy my mod and your circumstances allow, it would be amazing if you could buy me a cup of coffee, but first and foremost, enjoy your game!
[url=https://afdian.com/a/23754956rocco][img]https://i.imgur.com/WLIHcQs.jpeg[/img][/url]
You can join my discord channel for more information [url=https://discord.gg/QCznu6naGw]Rocco's Mod[/url]

[quote]About permission  
You are free to extract and use any content from my mod without asking for permission.  
If you want to republish my mod, you need to follow these rules:  
1. There must be substantial and important improvements.  
2. If my mod has not been updated for a long time and has caused many issues, you may modify and republish it.[/quote]

Workshop ID: 3461263912
Mod ID: CleanHotBar

3490188370.name: [B42]Project Cook (New)V1.0
3490188370.description:
[h2]This Mod already updated to match B42.13[/h2]

[hr]  
[h3]Special thanks to ivmakk for providing lots of inspiration and ideas for my mod

this new version require [B42]NeatUI Framework
[/h3]  

[h2]Open the Panel[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/BEiM234.png[/img]  
There are multiple ways to open the panel, allowing you to cook anytime you want  
[list]  
[*] When hovering over the crafting button, an “open panel” button will appear on the right side  
[*] Right-clicking any food or base item will give an option to open the panel; if the right-clicked item is a base item, it will also be set as the base item in the panel  
[/list]  

[h2]Base Item Panel[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qkBPeZ0.png[/img]  
You must first set a base item (e.g., cooking pot, sandwich, burger, or any container that can hold ingredients) before cooking  
[list]  
[*][b]Add Water Button:[/b] For liquid containers, this button will appear, searching for available water sources within 9 tiles and automatically filling them  
[*][b]Dump Button:[/b] For certain base items, you can dump and empty them, returning the container itself  
[*][b]Craft Button:[/b] Once you’ve selected the ingredients or seasonings you want to add, pressing this button will queue them for adding  
[*][b]Rename Button:[/b] Allows you to rename the dish you’ve crafted 
[*][b]Rating System:[/b] When the food you cook meets certain conditions, you’ll earn one point. This rating does not affect the cooked food and is for reference only.
[/list]  

[h2]Cooking Info Panel[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/cARXqpA.png[/img]  
Provides detailed hints so even beginners can quickly get used to the cooking system. Nutrition info (Calories, Fat, Protein, Carbohydrates) will be displayed depending on your traits and skills  
[list]  
[*][b]Nutritionist Trait:[/b] If you have the Nutritionist trait, you can see all nutrition details  
[*][b]Cooking Level LV2:[/b] You’ll see the nutrition digits, but exact values will be “?”  
[*][b]Cooking Level LV4:[/b] You’ll see exact values up to the “hundreds” place  
[*][b]Cooking Level LV6:[/b] You’ll see exact values up to the “tens” place  
[*][b]Cooking Level LV8:[/b] Same as Nutritionist, you’ll see all exact nutrition info  
[/list]  

[h2]Ingredients & Seasonings Panel[/h2]  
[img]https://i.imgur.com/woYddll.png[/img]  
After selecting a base item, you can add ingredients or seasonings to it, but there are some in-game rules and limitations  
[list]  
[*] Ingredients or seasonings already selected or contained in the base item will be shown in the title bar  
[*] Each base item has its own maximum number of ingredients allowed, while seasonings have no limit  
[*] You can right-click to select items with the same name but different instances  
[*] Each type of seasoning can only be added once, while the amount of ingredients depends on the item’s remaining quantity  
[*] Double-click to directly add an ingredient or seasoning. The “+” button first selects it, and then you can process it afterward  
[/list]  

[h2]Pixel Icon Pack[/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Gadotb2.png[/img]
If you like the pixel art style, you can enable another sub-mod, [Project Cook Pixel Icon Pack], to use the pixel icons created by ivmakk
[b]When you need to switch to a different set of icons, you must restart the game to update the corresponding icons[/b]

[h2]Update Plan[/h2]  
Currently working on a Kitchen Zone feature, similar to the Livestock Zone, allowing you to truly manage your kitchen  

[hr]
If you enjoy my mod and your circumstances allow, it would be amazing if you could buy me a cup of coffee, but first and foremost, enjoy your game!
[url=https://afdian.com/a/23754956rocco][img]https://i.imgur.com/WLIHcQs.jpeg[/img][/url]
You can join my discord channel for more information [url=https://discord.gg/QCznu6naGw]Rocco's Mod[/url]

[quote]About permission  
You are free to extract and use any content from my mod without asking for permission.  
If you want to republish my mod, you need to follow these rules:  
1. There must be substantial and important improvements.  
2. If my mod has not been updated for a long time and has caused many issues, you may modify and republish it.[/quote]


Workshop ID: 3490188370
Mod ID: Project_Cook

3513107552.name: [B42]Sector-7 Breach
3513107552.description:
[h1][b]Map Introduction:[/b][/h1]
       This is a strategic stronghold located between West Point and Riverside towns, with a vaccine research institute within the military jurisdiction. Due to an accident during vaccine research, the military district fell.
 The military district has left behind a large amount of military supplies, but there are many zombies lurking inside. If you want to explore, you need to be very careful.
After the fall of the military district, the situation in the city was also very bad.
 Most residents did not escape the fate of death, only a small number hid in underground shelters to escape.
The city has well-equipped facilities and abundant resources, but there are also many zombies in the resource points. In addition, there are some hidden locations on the map waiting for players to explore.




[h2][b]Tips：[/b][/h2]There is a building in the map with a high probability of flashing a sledgehammer, and two unique melee weapons are hidden locations in the map ( choose whether to use them or not）.


        [h3][b]If you encounter any problems while playing, please leave a message for feedback. Thank you!
[/b][/h3]

[h3][b]Add a new highway and activate the submodule on your own：Sector-7 Breach Highway[/b][/h3]

3572846242.name: Detailed Skill Tooltips
3572846242.description:
[h1]Detailed Skill Tooltips (Build 42.x)[/h1]
[i]Thanks to Champy for the Original Idea - [/i][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3134776712]Descriptive Tooltips for Skill Levels[/url]

[i]Crystal-clear, data-rich skill tooltips for Project Zomboid. See exactly what each level does - no need to tab out.[/i]

[hr]
[h2]What it does[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]Data-rich tooltips[/b] for every supported skill: shows real numbers (%, caps, multipliers) per level (1-10).
[*][b]Auto-learn & unlock lists[/b]: optional lists of recipes/buildables you gain as you level.
[*][b]Consistent formatting[/b]: uniform headers, spacing, and line wording across all skills.
[*][b]Per-skill logic[/b]: shows only values that actually change; hides irrelevant/zero lines.
[*][b]Configurable[/b]: toggle recipe/buildable sections and other extras in Mod Options.
[*][b]Extensible API[/b]: other mods can add/override skill definitions without forking this mod.
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Mod Support and Twitch[/h2]
Any questions you can find me in any of the places below:

[url=https://twitch.tv/eurymachus]Twitch[/url]
[url=https://discord.gg/eurymachus]Discord[/url]

[hr]
[h2]Features in detail[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]Per-level values:[/b] attack/block bonuses, carry capacity, endurance/fatigue multipliers, stealth radius, climb bonuses, etc. (varies by skill).
[*][b]Recipe/buildable intel:[/b] optional sections for [i]Auto-learned[/i] and [i]Requires Skill[/i] items, pulled from in-game recipe data.
[*][b]Localized text:[/b] uses standard IGUI_ translation tables; falls back to English if a key is missing.
[*][b]Performance-friendly:[/b] caches lookups; no heavy polling or OnTick spam.
[/list]

[hr]
[h2]Mod Options[/h2]
[i]Options -> Detailed Skill Tooltips[/i]
[list]
[*][b]Show Auto-learn Recipes:[/b] toggle the auto-learned list (on hover).
[*][b]Show Craftable Recipes:[/b] toggle the craftable recipes for required level list (on hover).
[*][b]Show Buildable Recipes:[/b] toggle the buildable recipes for required level list (on hover).
[*][b]Recipe Display Limit[/b]: limit or uncap list length for crafts/buildables.
[*]More presentation toggles will be added over time.
[/list]

[hr]
[h2]Compatibility[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]Build:[/b] 42.x
[*][b]UI mods:[/b] Generally compatible. Mods replacing vanilla skill tooltip code may need load-order tweaks.
[*][b]Recipe/Profession mods:[/b] Compatible; their recipes will appear if registered via ScriptManager.
[*]No vanilla files are overwritten; everything is added via Lua hooks/API.
[/list]

[hr]
[h2]FAQ[/h2]
[b]Q: Does this change XP rates or balance?[/b]
[i]A: No - its a UI/info mod only.[/i]

[b]Q: Why dont I see a recipe in the list?[/b]
[i]A: Some recipes are gated by magazines, traits, or context. We list whats available via your current level/source data.[/i]

[b]Q: Can I add my mods skill?[/b]
[i]A: Yes - use the API _Template and ship a small file in client/SkillDefs/.[/i]

Workshop ID: 3572846242
Mod ID: EURY_DST

3606927986.name: Estate 39
3606927986.description:
"Estate 39" is my first mod map for Build 42.

The mansion is located north of Rosewood, nestled deep in the forest, and is a small estate suitable for 1�C2 players.

The overall design is themed around Hatsune Miku, featuring a wide range of related furniture. The mansion includes a main building, basement, garage, pasture, and farm, offering relatively comprehensive facilities.

Due to its unique location, the number of zombies around the mansion is sparse, and it features a spawn point. However, because of its remote setting, it is not recommended as a starting location at the beginning of the game. Please consider this carefully.

Currently, this mod map does not conflict with the official map or other mod maps. No animals spawn in the pasture, and the farm does not come with any pre-planted crops. Additionally, there is a very low chance for vehicles to spawn.

Lot coordinates: [32,38][32,39][33,38][33,39]

Special thanks to mod map creator "ʮ��" for the video tutorials, as well as other mod authors who provided help and answers. I also extend our sincere gratitude to "���ĵ�����" for bug testing this map.

Workshop ID: 3606927986
Mod ID: Estate 39
Mod ID: Estate 39
Map Folder: Estate 39

I made this mod because I don't want the other mods that just pumps propane straight from the gas station.
